title: Carla Makes BA's Best Shrimp Scampi | From the Test Kitchen | Bon Appétit
description:
We urge you: don’t skip the marinade step—it really gives the shrimp lots of garlicky flavor and sets this apart from other scampi recipes.

Get the recipe: https://www.bonappetit.com/recipe/shrimp-scampi
